name: @imbuejs/core
description: Core components and utilities for Imbue Design System

scripts.build: yarn clean && ./node_modules/.bin/rollup -c && cp ./package.json build && rm -rf ~/.config/yarn/@imbuejs/core && cd build && yarn link
scripts.peer-deps:cra: cd ./test-env/create-react-app && yarn link '@imbuejs/core' && cd ./node_modules/react && yarn link && cd ../react-dom && yarn link && cd ../../../../ && yarn link react && yarn link react-dom
scripts.link-peer-deps:help: echo 'When developing locally, React protests with a misleading Rules of Hooks error that occurs because of duplicates of the react and react-dom peer dependencies. As additional test environments get added, new subscripts (i.e., && peer-deps:gatsby && peer-deps:nextjs) will need to be added.'
scripts.local:help:
echo 'Run this script before testing the library in an example project.
 - Copies the package.json to the build folder,
 - Removes existing yarn link,
 - Links to the build folder so that imports work like they will in production,
 - Prevents peer dependency duplicates of react and react-dom'
scripts.local: [ -d "./build" ] && cp ./package.json ./build/ && rm -rf ~/.config/yarn/link && cd build && yarn link && cd .. && yarn link-peer-deps || echo 'Please run yarn build or yarn build:watch in a separate tab first.'

author: jeffDevelops
